mng: to lean over, to fall (go down), to hide (in ambush), to conceal oneself, to lie low, hottest days of summer, to submit, to concede defeat, to overcome, to subdue, volt

exm.mng: up here, down there (idiom); to rise and fall in succession, no sooner one subsides, the next arises, repeating continuously, occurring again and again (of applause, fires, waves, protests, conflicts, uprisings etc)
to subdue, to vanquish, to tame
to move up and down, to undulate, ups and downs
foreshadowing (literary device), foretaste of material to come (in essay or story)
to hide, to cover up, to conceal
to ambush, to lie in wait for, to lie low, ambush
Fuxi or Fu Hsi, legendary Chinese emperor, trad. 2852-2738 BC, mythical creator of fishing, trapping and writing
